item.title: When Medicine Becomes Marketing: How Celebrities Are Selling GLP-1s, Peptides And Longevity Through Telehealth
item.description: Ro, Hims, and other telehealth and longevity companies are using celebrity to sell GLP-1s, imaging and diagnostics —raising FDA concerns.
